div.p:
Curia capitalis burgi de Abirdene tenta in
pretorio eiusdem tercio die mensis Octobris Anno Dominj millesimo
quadringentesimo nonogesimo primo

Quo die Johannes Culane Electus
fuit in officium prepositure pro Anno Instante prestito Solito Juramento

Eodem die thomas fyf Andreas Culane Junior et Andreas Culane
senior et Johannes menyeis electi fuerunt in officium balliuorum
pro Instante Anno prestitis Solitis Juramentis

Eodem die philippus Dunbrek Duncanus straloche Andreas nachty
et thomas Jamesone electi sunt in officium seriandorum pro Anno
Instante prestitis Solitis Juramentis

Eodem die perlectis tribus processibus per dominum Johannem Stirueling de ductis de
et super recuperacione proprietatis et possessionis Cuiusdam terre Jacentis infra dictum burgum
in vico viridi inter terram Alexandri chamer ex boreali et terram altaris beate marie mag
dalene ex australi et torrentem versus oriens et communionem viam regiam
versus occidens in defectu vnius annuj redditus quinque s' sibi et altari Sancte
Katherine virginis in ecclesia parrochiali beati nicholaij de Abirdene pertinen' alongo tempore
debit' et non soluit vnde dictus dominus Johannes peciit a ballivis seruicium formam sui processus
precedentis Juris et iusticie Complementum Tunc Curia mature auisiata
decreuit quod prefatus dominus Johannes procuratorio nomine dicti altaris possesionem et proprie
tatem dicte terre legittime recuperauit in defectu solucionis dicti annuj redditus
Et hoc ex ore Johannis Williamsone Judicatoris Curie pro Judicio data'
fuit Teste Curia

Eodem die thomas Rollande requisiuit prepositum et balliuos ad premuniendum Jacobum Kintor
et possessores annuj Redditus x s' de terra quondam Walteri pyot ad comparendum hodie ad
quindenam ad recipiendum summam debitum per eum de super dictum annuum Redditum quj premunierunt eundem
Jacobum personaliter apprehen' et Interesse haben' publice In Curia et cetera

Eodem die perlectis tribus processibus per dominum Johannem Kynnynmonde
capellanum et procuratorem altaris beate Katherine virginis in ecclesia cathedrali
Abirdonensis fundati deductis de et super recuperacione proprietatis et possessionis
Cuiusdam terre penitus vaste Jacentis infra dictum burgum inter terram Johannis hour
sone ex boreali ex vna et terram fratrum predicatorum ex australi extendentem in longitudine
a communi via regia versus oriens ad torrente le Denburne versus occidens
in defectu solucionis vnius annuj redditus triginta denariorum sibi et dicto altari
a longo tempore debito et non soluit vnde dictus dominus Johannes nomine procuratorio
quosupra peciit a ballivis secundum formam suj processus precedentis Juris et Justicie
complementum Tunc Curia mature auisiat' decretuit quod dictus capellanus proprie
tatem et possessionem dicte terre legittime recuperauit in defectu solucionis dicti
annuj redditus Et hoc ex ore Johannis Williamsone Judicatoris Curie
pro Judicio dat'a fuit Teste Curia

Eodem die accedens ad barram Willelmus andirson Jacobi protestatus fuit
pro vno annuo Redditu decim s' sibi annuatim debito de quadam terra
vasta Jacente in le grene inter terram quondam Johannis fauchside versus austrum
et terram Andree mason versus boriam Ad quam terram accedens ij li'
reperit distringibile preter terram et lapides quos balliuis in sacculo
presentauit in Curia tanquam tercio die huius processus Testibus Willelmo
gray thoma glenmaluyne et Andrea nachty seriando dicte terre

Eodem die accedens ad barram Willelmus andirsone Jacobi protestatus
fuit pro vno annuo redditu septem quatuor s' sibi annuatim debito de quadam
terra vasta quondam Johannis fauchside Jacente in le grene inter terram capellanum
et altaris Sancti Johannis ewangeliste inter terram ex australi et terram thome
quhit ex boreali Ad quam terram Accedens nichil reperit distringibile
preter terram et lapides quos balliuis in sacculo presentauit in cur
ia tanquam tercio die huius processus Testibus Willelmo gray thoma
glenmaluyn et Andrea nachty seriando

Eodem die accedens ad barram dominus matheus nicholson capellanus ac procurator
capellanorum collegij Abirdonensis et protestatus fuit pro vno annuo redditu x s' dictis
capellanis annuatim debito de quadam terra vasta Jacente in vico furcarum ex orientali
parte eiusdem vici inter terram quondam Richardi Kintor ex australi et terram
capellanorum et altaris Sancti petri ex boriali Ad quam terram accedens nichil reperit
distringibile preter terram et lapides quos ballivis in Sacculo presentauit
in Curia tanquam primo die huius processus Testibus Willelmo gray thome
glenmaluyne et Andrea nachty seriando

Eodem die Accedens ad barram Willelmus andirsone senior et protestatus
fuit pro vno annuo redditu iiijor s' sibi annuatim debito de quadam terra
vasta Jacente in vico nauium ex orientali parte eiusdem vici inter terram
quondam Robert newinsone ex australi et terram Andree Ranison' ex boreali
et terram dicti Willelmj versus oriens et communionem viam regiam versus
occidens Ad quam terram accedens nichil reperit distringibile preter
terram et lapides quos ballivis in Sacculo presentavit in Curia
tanquam primo die huius processus Testibus Alexandro bonatmakar Alexandro
beuerlay et Duncano straloche seriando

Eodem die accedens ad barram Alexander mar et protestatus fuit pro vno
annuo redditu x s' sibi annuatim debito de quadam terra penitus
vasta Jacente in vico furcarum ex occidentali parte eiusdem vici inter terram Dauid
prat ex australi et terram eduardi top ex boreali et communionem viam regiam
versus oriens et lacum dicti burgi versus accedens ad quam terram accedens
nichil reperit distringibile preter terram et lapides quos ballivis in sacculo
presentavit in Curia tanquam secundo die huius processus Testibus Willelmo gray
thoma glenmaluyn et Andrea nachty seriando

Curia gilde burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem
Septimo die Octobris Anno quo supra

Eodem die Iste persone subscripte electi fuerunt in consilium
Consilium
Schir Jonhne ruthirfurde
Alexander chamer the fadir
Alexander menyeis
Robert blinsele
Dauid menyeis yongar
Jonhne Knollis
Jonhne colison'
Alexander rede
Thome prat
Androw branche
Jhone Wormet
Androw murray eldar
Alexander chamer yongar
Wat auchneywe
William Kintor
Dauid matheson'
Thome mar
Richerd hill eldar
Androw Wentone
Jhon' moire
William blinsell

Donalde strachin henry bavne William Dunbrek Richerd
litstar William fywe Jonhne Durwarde Androw muresone
Androw clerk James andirsone and William philpe

the saide day the aldirman and consall grantit xx s' to be gevin to Wille
balheluy of the next burges that is maide for the enteres' that he pretendit to
haue of the office of seriandschipe

Evin quartar
Philp Dunbrek seriande Jhone cowis and Wille sprute
Crukit quartar
Androu nachty seriande Williame Wobstar and gilbert litstar
grene quartar
Duncane straloche seriande Jhone ranisone and Sandy pottar' Will scharpe
futy quartar
Thomas Jamesone Jonhne bogy and Donalde bandone

lynaris
Alexander chamer eldar thomas prat Androw branche Alexander mar Androw
murray eldar Androw Wyntone and Robert blinsele crage was chosin
and suorne lynaris for this yer'

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem decimo
die Octobris Anno quo supra

the saide day the aldirman and ballieis assignit philp Dunbrek to content
and pay to thomas menyeis or till the spous' of Alexander menyeis his procurator
In that constitute ane barrell of Salmonde or ellis v markis eftir
the tenouris of the ak maide tharapon' within xv dais

the samyn day philp Dunbrek askit and requirit the aldirman and balyeis
to ger warne James Kintor ande thomas fyf and charge tham to fre
and releif him of the barrele of Salmonde aucht to thomas menyeis
eftir the tenour of the ake maide tharapon' obefore

the saide day In Jugement Williame blinsele grantit him avande to
thomas chamer xiij s' and iiij d' quhilk the ballieis chargit him to pay within
terme of law to the saide thomas or his procuratouris or till his wyf

the samyne day Jonhne ranisone cordonar grantit him awande to thomas
meldrum iij li' and iiij s' Scottis money to be pait him lelely and treulie be
tuix this and yule next eftir follouing but ony langar delay

the saide day It was deliuerit and decretit be ane Suorne assis' thomas
mar forspekar that Jonhne gilespy sal pay to Androw lousone ix s'
g' licht money in the feire or till his procuratouris eftir the erast schipe
passand' with merchandice out of the port of Abirdene cum in zelande Ande
falyeing tharof he sall pay him her the saide money

The saide day sere Jonhne ruthirfurd knicht factour to thome Wattis Inglisman
follouit Jonhne colisone thomas prat murthow glenmaluyn avnaris of the
barbora for the wranguis' Intrometinge and withhaldinge of ane mast quhilkis
allegit that the saide mast was gevin to thomez chamer Dauid steuart and tham
and tuk tham to preyf It and askit ane lauchful day to bringe thar preuis and
the aldirman and balyeis assignit to tham to bringe thar preuis beinge within this
schier within this day xv dais Ande to bringe thame beinge beyonde
fortht within xl dais to depone In the saide mater

the saide day Dauid mar grantit that he saide to Robert of Culane
Will ye gif me ane acquitance and I sal gif yow xxxv g'

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio xiiij dat die
Octobris Anno quosupra

the saide day it was statute and ordanit be the aldirman balyeis and
diuers' of the counsale that the candilmakaris sal make j li' of made
candile gude ande sufficient stuf with dry wekis for iij d' vndir the payn'
of eschetis of the candillis and viij s' vnforgewin of Ilkan brekar of
this statute

the samyn day canny the spous' of Jhone chamer was in Amerciament of the
court be ane suorne assis' William blinsel forspekar for the wranguis'
strubulance and skathtinge of Dauid theman in done castyne of wattir and filtht
In his hous' and to Amende as law wile and forber In tyme to Cum

the saide day the saide canny was in ane Amerciament of the Court for the wrang
uis' strubulance of Jhone chamer Dauid theman in the court and to Amende as law wile
and forber In tyme to Cum

Item the saidez' Dauid and canny leis was oblist be the fathtis of thar
bodiis thar handis vphaldin to stand at the ordinance of the assis' the quhilk
ordanit the saide canny to ask the saide Dauid forgevynnes and to stande in
cherite and quhilk of tham that offendis till vthiris sal pay v merkis to
Sanct nicholes' werk vnforgevin eftir thai be conuikit tharintill

the saide day it was appontit betuix Jonhne malison one that ane
part Ande Dauid beuerlay one that vthir parte as eftir followis that is to say the
saide Jhone sal pay to the saide Dauid vij s' and vjiij d' and he sal deliuer
him the caldrone laide in wede be marion' glenny and the said Jhone
hes remittit him the occupeinge of the said caldron' and to occupy it quhile
It be redemyt fra him

the samyn day mege marion' balcromy was in Amerciament of the Court for the strubulance
of thomez Jamesone in execucion of his office and to Amend' as law will
and forber to Cum And' gif euer scho offendis till him or tile ony wthir
officiar In tyme to Cum scho sal pay x s' to Sanct nicholes' werk
vnforgevin quhilk was ordanit be the assis'

Curia legalis balliuorum bugi burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio
xvij die Octobris Anno quosupra

The saide day William gray was quyt of demi quartar of lynt be
ane assis' followit be Jok blabir

the saide day patrik adamsone was lauchfullie callit to entir William
scherar as he that come Souerte to Entir him befor the aldirman and balyeis
to ansuer to the borghe' strekit apon' the said' William be the procuratouris
of Jhone Stronoche burges of montros' for the wranguis'
withhaldin fra him of the vaile of fiwe rinsche guthtlingis as lent
siluer eftir the tenor of his obligacion quhilk comperit nocht quharfore
the balyeis chargit Androw nachty officiar to pas' and tak ane stres'
of the saide patrik and lat it to borghe gif It be askit and warne him
to Entir the said' William befor the balyeis this day xv dais
as secunde day of proces' to ansuer to the said' borghe

The saide day comperit Williame of chamer skippar of ane schip
callit the peter pertening to george of Corntone follouit Williame'
scleiche for the fraucht of Certane salmond' laide In the saide schipe
quhilkis fraucht the saide Williame scleiche deny and allegit he awthe
nocht to pay the saide fraucht bot gif his gudis hed bene furit
to leithe Ande incontinent the saide actione with consent of batht the
partiis was put to the decisione of ane assis' quhilkis riplie
avisit the richtis of batht the partiis herd and vndirstandin the gret
bodely aithe suorne deliuerit be the moutht of Alexander rede talisman
of the saide assis' that the saide William scleitht sal content and pay
to the said' William of chamer haill fraucht for the gudis that he
laide in the said' scheip Ande gif scho beis mendit scho sal
fuyr his gudis to leithe Ande he will thoill thame reman'
quhile scho be mendit
Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio xix die Octobris Anno quo supra

the saide day it was gevin for dome be warde of the court
that Dauid prat wranguislie haldis xx s' fra thome narne
for ane cow and aw to pay him the saide Siluer and resaue his cow

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xxo
die octobris Anno quosupra

the saide day Androw murray
eldar grantit and oblist him to ger his sone resinge and ourgif the
sesin of the croft that he sauld' to thome prat in ane balyeis
handis and Sele the chartir with his sonis seile but fraude and
gile

the samyn day the aldirman and balyeis assignit monunday that
next cumis to thome Waus to ansuer to Jhone Kintor in his modir
nayme for the wranguis' haldin fra him of hir Witsonday maile
extendinge to xxx s'

the saide A day Androw lammyntone was conuikit be ane assis' for the
wranguis' haldin of tene s' g' fra Dauid spens

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xxjo
die octobris Anno quo supra

the said' day Duncan smitht grantit him borghe to Jhone Knollis
for demi barrele of Salmonde for Jhone brogane quhilk the balyeis
chargit him to pay within terme of law

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio xxiiij die Octobris anno
quo supra

Eodem die magnus Wormet constituit creauit et nominauit dominum Johannem
ruthirfurde militem Robertum blinsele et Johannem Wormet coniunctim et diuisim
suos procuratores in actionibus debatabilibus inter ipsum et Willelmum gareauche ac
in omnibus aliis actionibus ipsum concernentibus promitten' se Rato et grato
in vberiore forma procuratorij cum omnibus terminis necessariis et oportunis

the saide day it was deliuerit be ane assis' Robert blinsele forspekar
that Will verty sal pay xiij s' and iiij d' scottis money be Sanct
nicholes' day next to cum for ane pece of clath to Emy theman
but ony langar delay fraude or gill

the samyn day the aldirman balyeis and diuers' of the consal and communite
warnit and gathtreit for the the tyme be the officiaris consentit and grantit
that Sex g' of flemys money salbe takin of euere sek of woll and skin
of euere last of Salmonde and hidis to the redschip of the bautkin
tile our glorious' patrone Saint Nicholes' vnto the tyme that
xiij li' g' of gude money avand' for the saide bautkin to arnald' wan
stakinburghe portar of brugis be pait Ande ordanit ane commission'
to thomas chamer Jonhne menyeis Jhone of mar and Alexander angouson'
vndir the Secret Seill to resaue the said bautkin and awunt
it in the best schip cumand' in Scotlande quhar thai think most
expedient

the xxviij day of october' the yer forsaide comperit sere Jonhne
ruthirfurde of tarlane knicht and Inquerit at the aldirman and ballieis gif
thar was ony witnes producit or leide beinge within this schier
to depone In the matir debatabile betuix him and Jhone colison thomas
prat and thar fallouis anent ane mast and a wande followit be the saide
knicht In the nayme of thomas Wattis Inglisman quhilkis ansuerde
and schew thar was nayne producit sene the first day of quhilkis
the deposicionis ar in writ tharfor the saide knicht protestit that nayne
presens beinge within this schier suld' be leide or herde aganis him
In the said' matir sene the xv dais was runnyne and gane

Eodem die Johannes Kintor amerciatur pro perturbio laurencij smyth Cuj dabit
pro emenda libram cere ad lumine misse Sancti Sanguinis v s' parti lese
et quinque s' Johanni sanclar barbetonsori

Curia legalis balliuorum tenta in pretorio vltimo die octobris Anno quo
supra

Eodem die murdacus glenmaluyn in Amerciamento Curie per confessionem propriam pro perturbio
Curie in verbo quj emendare Judicatur ut Jura volunt

Eodem die magnus galt conuictus per assisam pro forestallacione burgi in emp
cio pellium

Eodem die Walterus atkin et Ebota mater sua obligarunt se per manus suos
ad standum et subeundum constitucioni ordinacioni et decreto Alexandri rede thome
prat Willelmi blinsel et Andree murray senioris penes clameum omni
bonorum eidem Waltero per decessum quondam primis suj pertinen' Et si
fuerit thomas fyf erit eus superior quj per sua Juramenta Incipient
huiusmodi actionem feria quinta proxime sequente et suum decretum dabunt
infra quindecim dies immediate sequens

Eodem die Andreas lammyntone legittime vocatus ad respondendum plegio super
ipsum porrecto per Johannem lammyntone pro iniusta detencione ab eo summe
xxxiij s' et iiij d' pro carnibus non comparuit Igitur precipitur thome Jame
son seriando ad capiendum districtum ab eodem Andrea et eundem ad
plegium Iterum dimitti si petatur et premuniend' ipsum hodie ad quindenam
ad respondendum dicto plego plegio tanquam secundo die huius processus

the saide day Comperit sere Jonhne stirueling procurator for Jhon' stronoche
burges of montros' with his prelocutoris Jonhne Colison and Williame
blinsele and producit ane obligacion of fiwe rinsche guthtlingis
maid be villiam scherar to the saide Jhone stronoche quhilkis
obligacion beinge rede and vndirstandin the saide procurator askit pay
ment of the saide fiwe rinsche guthtlingis as lent siluer eftir
the tenor of the saide obligacion Ande the saide Williame
scherar be him and Alexander rede his forspekar allegit he was compel
lit and constrenyet to mak the said' obligacion and maid' it of force
In contrar law and reson' and askit ane day to preyf his said' allegiance
lauchfullie as efferit And' the aldirman and balyeis with consent of batht the
said' partiis assignit our lady ewin next to cum the morne eftir Sanct
nicholes' day next immediate hereftir to the said' William to preyf his
said' allegeance befor thame within the said' tolbutht lauchfulley as
efferis And Jonhne grige come Souerte to Entir the said' William befor
the said' aldirman and balyeis within the tolbutht the said' day thar to do
that accordis him of law and Justice be his hand' vphaldin'

the saide day sere Johnne ruthirfurde taxt the mast and wande beinge
within the barbora follouit be him to xx li' requiring the aldirman and
balyeis to tak Souerte of his party to be responsale tile him for
the said' some gif he optentit the said' mast be law Ande Jhon'
Colison be his hande and gudis oblist him to the balyeis to pay his
part of the said' mast gif the said' knicht recoueris It be law

the said' day Alexander rede Androw branche William blinsele Jonhne
menyeis suorne and thomas mar to be suorne was chosin summissouris
In presens of aldirman and balyeis with consent of Jonhne Colison one that
ane part and murtho glenmaluyn one that vthir parte to determe and ende the
compt and rekning clamyt be the said' murthow vpone the saide Jhon'
Colison' gevin in ane bill producit in Jugement

the saide day Dauid theman and canny leis spous' to Johne of chamer was oblist
be the fathtis of thar bodiis to stand' at the ordinance of the assis' for the strubulance
done to the said' Dauid bath in the court and in his hous' in the done casting of filitht
one him that gif euere scho committis ony strubulance in tym to cum to the saide Dauid'
or tile ony vthir famous' persone hir nichbour scho sal pay five merkis to Saint
nicholes werk

Quinto die nouembris Anno quo supra In presencia thome fyf vnius balliuorum
comparuit marioria traile sponsa Alexander rollande cum Willelmo cuminge de
Inuerelloghe suo prelocutoro et exposuit qualiter dictus suus sponsus terram
suam morte suo Willelmo philp alienare proposuerat quam terram nunquam
resignauerat quam pretensam alienacionem cessauit reuocavit et annulauit infra
asseruit se choact' compulsamque metu mort' per dictum sponsum suum ad conferendum
huiusmodi pretense alienacioni Igitur permissam putatiuam resignacionem et alienacionem reuocavit
protestando Solempniter pro Juris remedio quod nullum premissorum cedat
sibi in preiudicium Testibus Johanne Wormet Willelmo Kintor Andrea fyf Jacobo
Cuminge Johanne furde et Willelmo philp et Inde dicta mariota peciit Instan'

Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio Septimo die nouembris Anno
quosupra

the samyn day Will blitht yongar conuikit be ane assis' henry
hourum forspekar for the wranguis' strubulance of Will blitht his
brothir and to gif j li' of wax to the haly blud' licht Ande gif
euer he strublis his said' brothir or ony of his fallowis and beis
conuikit tharin he sal pay xx s' to Sanct nicholes' werk vnfor
gevin

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio ix die nouembris
Anno quo supra

the saide day the aldirman with avys' of ane part of the consale
present for the tyme ordanit the haill consal be warnit to be warnit
in apon settirday next to cum quhilk day he assignit to sere Jhon'
ruthirfurde to schew with thar avys' quhat wais of pament suld'
be maid to the said' knicht of fyfti merkis avand' him be the
decret of the Auditouris of his compt this yer bigane
Curia legalis tenta in pretorio xiiij die nouembris Anno quo supra

Eodem die gilbertus Waus de many fecit constituit et ordinauit
Alexandrum rede suum legittimum procuratorem ad petendum et recipiendum ab Andrea
Waus decim marcas et de receptis acquitand' prosequend' agend'
et defendend' promitten' de Rato et grato in vberiore forma procuratorij

Eodem die Andreas lammyntone legittime vocatus ad respondendum plegio super
ipsum porrecto per Johannem lammyntone pro iniusta detencione ab
eo summe xxxiij s' et iiij d' non comparuit Igitur precipitur philippo
Dunbrek seriando capere districtum ab eo et Idem ad plegium dimitti
si petatur Et ipsum premunire hodie ad quindenam tanquam 3o die
huius processus

the samyn day Androw Waus follouit gilbert Waus of many for
the wranguis' haldin fra him of xvj s' and ij d' vj s' and viij d'
for burdis / v d' for a sclot v markis for his expens to Edinburghe
doinge in his erandis Ande xl s' for the expens that he mad'
for the optening of v markis anent thome gledstane quhilkis
action' was putt to the decisione of ane assis' quhilkis riplie
auisit deliuerit and fand' the said' Androw gilbert quyt of ale the
said' Somes except' xvj s' ij d' vj s' and viij d' for burdis
and xv s' maid' to the said' Androw for his expens to the parlement

the said' day gilbert Waus of many protestit that the acquitance he
has gevin to Androw Waus of v markis turne him to nay preiudice
anent the x markis recouerit apon him in the balye court of Abirdene obefor
and Androw nachty at commavnd' of the balyeis chargit the said' Androw to
reman within the tolbutht quhile he pait the said' x markis
